Wildlands Data Bible (v1): - Single source of truth for launch + planned roster, Directed Evolution nodes, slot contracts, silhouette locks, stages, props, weapons, VFX/SFX placeholders.
How to use in IntelliJ/Gradle pipeline (recommended):
1) Export Creatures + EvolutionNodes + SlotContracts to JSON in tools (asset-tools) via a spreadsheet->json task.
2) Use SilhouetteBible + SlotContracts during sprite regen acceptance.
3) Use Stages + Props to drive arena generation and readable prop art briefs.
- IDs are lowercase snake/camel with dots for nodeIds (creature.node).
- Any spriteId starting with 'vfx_' is a VFX atlas sprite placeholder.
- Any prop art brief explicitly forbids circles/squares as final silhouettes.
